A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I had high hopes for star wars following the force awakens and rogue one\, but I cant recommend this film. Most of the story is pointless and everything seems superficial. The plot is full of plot holes that even the force cannot plug. The story is definitely aimed at children and is very simplistic. A supremely pants rehash of the empire strikes back. Star Wars is terminally ill\, if not dead.
